name: PAT_CALL_DISPTRACK
description: The PAT_CALL_DISPTRACK table contains the information about the disposition history of the patient. Each row contains information about the original disposition and the new disposition.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE_COUNT
columns.description: The line number of the disposition history within the encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the encounter associated with this social history contact. Note: There may be multiple encounters on the same calendar date.

columns.name: DISP_OLD_C_NAME
columns.description: The disposition that was edited, changed, or deleted.

columns.name: DISP_NEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The new disposition added to the patient record.

columns.name: DISP_OVERRD_TIME
columns.description: The time the disposition was overridden.

columns.name: DISP_OVER_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered by the user when overriding the disposition.

columns.name: DISP_OVER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason, entered by the user, for overriding the disposition.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
